cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: I am in the sky.
I help plants grow.
I disappear when it is nighttime.

cosmos.question: I shine at night and sometimes have a face. What am I?

hints.text: I am round.
Sometimes you see me during the day but you need to try to see me!
Wolves love to howl at me!

cosmos.question: I am a bright light, very far away. I twinkle at night. What am I?

hints.text: I am up in the sky.
I am smaller than the Sun.
I shine with my own light.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and water that goes around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: You live here!
I am round like a ball.
I have lots of green and blue on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: Some people use me to navigate.
I have a name, like the Big Dipper.
I am made of many stars.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, red planet. What am I?

hints.text: People want to visit me one day!
I am a planet.
I am named after a god of war.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas far away, with beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: I am a planet.
My rings are made of ice and rock.
I am very big!

cosmos.question: I am a group of many, many stars and planets all together. What am I?

hints.text: I am very big.
The Sun is a part of me.
Our one is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a scientist who studies the stars and planets. What am I called?

hints.text: I use a telescope.
I am curious about the universe.
I know a lot about space.

cosmos.question: I am a long journey to travel into space. What am I called?

hints.text: It starts on Earth and goes to space.
Astronauts go on me.
It's very exciting!

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: I come from the clouds.
You need an umbrella when I fall.
Plants drink me.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine bright in the day. What am I?

hints.text: I give you warmth.
I help you see.
I'm in the sky, but only during the day.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: Sometimes I look like animals.
I can bring rain.
Birds fly around me.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: You can make snowballs with me.
I am very cold.
I melt when it gets warm.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, followed by a loud sound. What am I?

hints.text: I come during a storm.
I can be scary.
I happen at the same time as thunder.

weather.question: I am a loud rumbling sound that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: I also come during a storm.
You can hear me, but not see me.
I follow the flash.

weather.question: I am many colors that appear in the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: I have the colors red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
The sun must be behind you to see me.
I look like an arch.

weather.question: I am strong and can blow things around, sometimes gently, sometimes very hard. What am I?

hints.text: I can make the leaves dance.
You can fly a kite with me.
I am air moving.

weather.question: I am tiny balls of ice that fall from the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: I can hurt if I hit you.
I am harder than snow.
I'm frozen raindrops.

weather.question: I am water in the air that makes it hard to see, like a cloud on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: You can't see very far when I'm around.
I often happen in the morning.
I make things feel damp.
